snippet.title: Judge Dredd | SNES Longplay
snippet.description:
If you like, see this newer playthrough with better video quality (https://youtu.be/-kIRlo9b5Fc). Even though this film was never thought of as a "proper" Dredd movie, more like a Stallone action/sci-fi vehicle with the name Judge Dredd slapped on it, see this great analysis about the ways this film was actually influenced from 2000 AD. 

* https://www.batman-online.com/forum/index.php?topic=3743.0

Judge Dredd: The Game links
* http://www.hardcoregaming101.net/judge-dredd/
